# **Complicated tasks made _superSimple_**

_**osxroot**_ is the deep dark coder side of [mac007.com](http://www.mac007.com), an OS X Server consulting firm. In addition to scripts to simplify managing OS X, _**osxroot**_ also offers step by step tutorials for the non technical do it yourselfer. 

_**superScripts**_ are mostly written for OS X 10.6 and higher. Some may only work on certain versions and we will notate these to the best of our ability. Please use, enjoy and feel free to contribute and improve them. We love seeing how other coders think.  


**Got Mail Server?** Check out our good friends over at [TopicDesk](http://www.topicdesk.com) for awesome mail server & spam related tools and tutorials.
***
***



### epicArch - mailbox archiving
***
This little tool will make any sysadmins life a bit easier. Written specifically for OS X Dovecot mail servers.
High mailbox counts on default boxes ( INBOX, Sent & Deleted ) can degrade mail server performance quickly and as we all know you cannot rely on users to keep their boxes properly maintained. **_epicArch_** will allow you to quickly archive these boxes into a very easy to follow structure. Users are automatically subscribed to their archived folders and the mail remains fully searchable via the chosen mail client. When used with a crontab it makes mailbox maintenance almost automated. Can be called with -h for options and examples. 

`bash <(curl -Ls http://git.io/DHmBhA)`
